verses.verse: For <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem,<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> of the <S%G5310>Most<s%> <S%G5310>High<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G4876>met<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> as he was <S%G5290>returning<s%> from the <S%G2871>slaughter<s%> of the <S%G935>kings<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> him,

to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G3307>apportioned<s%> a <S%G1181>tenth<s%> <S%G1181>part<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> [the spoils], was <S%G4413>first<s%> of <S%G4413>all,<s%> by the <S%G2059>translation<s%> [of his name], <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%> and <S%G1899>then<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G4532>Salem,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is <S%G935>king<s%> of <S%G1515>peace.<s%>

<S%G540>Without<s%> <S%G540>father,<s%> <S%G282>without<s%> <S%G282>mother,<s%> <S%G35>without<s%> <S%G35>genealogy,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3383>neither<s%> <S%G746>beginning<s%> of <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3383>nor<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> of <S%G2222>life,<s%> but <S%G871>made<s%> <S%G871>like<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> he <S%G3306>abides<s%> a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1519>perpetually.<s%> <S%G1336><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2334>observe<s%> <S%G4080>how<s%> <S%G4080>great<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> was to <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> the <S%G3966>patriarch,<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> a <S%G1181>tenth<s%> of the <S%G205>choicest<s%> <S%G205>spoils.<s%>

And <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G3017>Levi<s%> who <S%G2983>receive<s%> the priest's <S%G2405>office<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> in the <S%G3551>Law<s%> to <S%G586>collect<s%> a <S%G586>tenth<s%> from the <S%G2992>people,<s%> that is, from their <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2539>although<s%> these are <S%G1831>descended<s%> <S%G3751><s%> from <S%G11>Abraham.<s%>

But the one whose <S%G1075>genealogy<s%> is not <S%G1075>traced<s%> from them <S%G1183>collected<s%> a <S%G1183>tenth<s%> from <S%G11>Abraham,<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> the one who <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G1860>promises.<s%>
But <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3956>any<s%> <S%G485>dispute<s%> the <S%G1640>lesser<s%> is <S%G2127>blessed<s%> by the <S%G2909>greater.<s%>

And in <S%G5602>this<s%> <S%G5602>case<s%> <S%G599>mortal<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2983>receive<s%> <S%G1181>tithes,<s%> but in that <S%G1563>case<s%> one [receives them], of whom it is <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> that he <S%G2198>lives<s%> on.

And, <S%G5613>so<s%> <S%G2031><s%> to <S%G3004>speak,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G11>Abraham<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3017>Levi,<s%> who <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G1181>tithes,<s%> <S%G1183>paid<s%> <S%G1183>tithes,<s%>
for he was <S%G2089>still<s%> in the <S%G3751>loins<s%> of his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%> <S%G4876>met<s%> him.

<S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5050>perfection<s%> was <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3020>Levitical<s%> <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> (for on the <S%G1909>basis<s%> of it the <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G3549>received<s%> the <S%G3549>Law<s%>), <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2089>further<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> [was there] for <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> to <S%G450>arise<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%> and not be <S%G3004>designated<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of Aaron?
For when the <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> is <S%G3346>changed,<s%> of <S%G318>necessity<s%> there <S%G1096>takes<s%> <S%G1096>place<s%> a <S%G3331>change<s%> of <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2532>also.<s%>

For the one <S%G1909>concerning<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> are <S%G3004>spoken<s%> <S%G3348>belongs<s%> to <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G5443>tribe,<s%> from <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> has <S%G4337>officiated<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar.<s%>

For it is <S%G4271>evident<s%> that our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G393>descended<s%> from <S%G2455>Judah,<s%> a <S%G5443>tribe<s%> with <S%G1519>reference<s%> to <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2409>priests.<s%>

And this is <S%G2612>clearer<s%> <S%G2089>still,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G450>arises<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G3665>likeness<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek,<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> [such] not on the <S%G2596>basis<s%> of a <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G4560>physical<s%> <S%G1785>requirement,<s%> but <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1411>power<s%> of an <S%G179>indestructible<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
For it is <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> [of Him], "Thou art a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> <S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek.<s%>"

For, on the <S%G3303>one<s%> <S%G3303>hand,<s%> there is a <S%G115>setting<s%> <S%G115>aside<s%> of a <S%G4254>former<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of its <S%G772>weakness<s%> and <S%G512>uselessness<s%>

(for the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G3762>nothing<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%>), and on the <S%G1161>other<s%> <S%G1161>hand<s%> there is a <S%G1898>bringing<s%> in of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we <S%G1448>draw<s%> <S%G1448>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And <S%G2596>inasmuch<s%> <S%G3745><s%> as [it was] not <S%G5565>without<s%> an <S%G3728>oath<s%>

(for they <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> an <S%G3728>oath,<s%> but He with an <S%G3728>oath<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the One who <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G3660>sworn<s%> And will not <S%G3338>change<s%> His <S%G3338>mind,<s%> 'Thou art a <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G165>forever<s%>'");
<S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>much<s%> the <S%G2596>more<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> has <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G1450>guarantee<s%> of a <S%G2909>better<s%> <S%G1242>covenant.<s%>

And the [former] <S%G2409>priests,<s%> on the <S%G3303>one<s%> <S%G3303>hand,<s%> <S%G1510>existed<s%> <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G4183>greater<s%> <S%G4183>numbers,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> they were <S%G2967>prevented<s%> by <S%G2288>death<s%> from <S%G3887>continuing,<s%>
but He, on the <S%G1161>other<s%> <S%G1161>hand,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> He <S%G3306>abides<s%> <S%G165>forever,<s%> <S%G2192>holds<s%> His <S%G2420>priesthood<s%> <S%G531>permanently.<s%>

<S%G3606>Hence,<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> He is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1519>forever<s%> <S%G3838><s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G4334>draw<s%> <S%G4334>near<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> Him, since He <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> to <S%G1793>make<s%> <S%G1793>intercession<s%> for them.

For it was <S%G4241>fitting<s%> that we should have <S%G5108>such<s%> a <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> <S%G3741>holy,<s%> <S%G172>innocent,<s%> <S%G283>undefiled,<s%> <S%G5563>separated<s%> from <S%G268>sinners<s%> and <S%G5308>exalted<s%> above the <S%G3772>heavens;<s%>

<S%G3739>who<s%> does not <S%G318>need<s%> <S%G2596>daily,<s%> <S%G2250><s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priests,<s%> to <S%G399>offer<s%> up <S%G2378>sacrifices,<s%> <S%G4387>first<s%> for His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%> and <S%G1899>then<s%> for the [sins] of the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G1063>because<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> He <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G2178>once<s%> for <S%G2178>all<s%> when He <S%G399>offered<s%> up <S%G1438>Himself.<s%>

For the <S%G3551>Law<s%> <S%G2525>appoints<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> as <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> who are <S%G769>weak,<s%> but the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G3728>oath,<s%> which came <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3551>Law,<s%> [appoints] a <S%G5207>Son,<s%> <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> <S%G165>forever.<s%>
